attributes.action: Demand that Stafford Council repair pot holes to prevent damage to our vehicles
attributes.additional_details: Surely poor road surfaces are a contribution unsafe roads .
attributes.background: The amount of pot holes on our roads in stafford is abysmal. It should be manditary that the council keep our roads safe. Pot holes are a hazard and the amount of dangerous holes around the county is disgraceful.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your county council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

https://www.staffordshire.gov.uk/yourcouncil/petitions/Home.aspx
